disease_name: Nasal cavity and paranasal sinus cancer
summary: Cancer of the nasal cavity and paranasal sinuses is rare. The paranasal sinuses are small hollow spaces around the nose lined with mucus-producing cells. The nasal cavity is the passageway behind the nose for air to reach the throat.
symptoms: Symptoms can be like those of infections
diagnosis: Lighted tube-like instruments that look inside the nose
